snippet: In “The Men Dancers: From the Horse’s Mouth ” dancers of varying ages and genres gather for an intimate showcase of talking and dancing.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews The Men Dancers: From the Horse's Mouth, part of dance and story series, at Theater at 14th Street Y.
lead_paragraph: In “The Men Dancers: From the Horse’s Mouth ” dancers of varying ages and genres gather for an intimate showcase of talking and dancing.

headline.seo: ‘The Men Dancers: From the Horse’s Mouth’ at 14th Street Y
headline.main: To Tell a Story, You Have to Have the Right Moves
headline.print_headline: To Tell a Story, You Have to Have the Right Moves
